file.name: test.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0

info:
  version: 0.0.1
  title: Tarefas a fazer

components:
  parameters:
    ID:
      in: path
      name: id
      required: true
      schema:
        type: integer
        minimum: 1
      description: ID do Todo

  schemas:
    Todo:
      type: object
      required:
        - todo
      properties:
        todo:
          type: string
        status:
          type: string
    Todos:
      type: object
      properties:
        todos:
          type: array
          items:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Todo'
    NotFound:
      type: object
      properties:
        message:
          type: string

paths:
  /todo:
    # Criação da tarefa
    post:
      summary: Cria uma nova tarefa
      description: Cria uma nova tarefa, baseada e xpto...
      responses:
        201:
          description: Tarefa criada com sucesso
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Todo'
        422:
          description: "Erro no payload"
    
    get:
      summary: Lista as tarefas
      responses:
        200:
          description: Sucesso
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Todos'
                
  /todo/{id}:
    get:
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ID'
      responses:
        200:
          description: Sucesso
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Todo'
        404:
          description: Não encontrado
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/NotFound'
    delete:
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ID'

      responses:
        200:
          description: Sucesso
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Todo'
        404:
          description: Não encontrado
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/NotFound'
    patch:
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ID'

      responses:
        404:
          description: Não encontrado
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/NotFound'
